title: Beautiful natural habitat for living
posting_body: Perfect location and setting for a peaceful nights sleep and work environment in this natural light condominium on north end of Evanston.
Two bedrooms/two bath with open kitchen living room facing southern exposure.
All appliances three years old along with updated sink/faucet.
Balacony faces pond and beautiful tree scape.
Includes in house washer/dryer unit and underground heated garage space plus storage space.
New work out facility and all glass indoor heated pool and spa.
If you serenity to be able to work from home or just a peaceful surrounding to return home to, now is the time to make that change from your present location.
November 1st occupancy but can move in at n/c middle of October.
Prefer 2 year lease but will consider 1 year.
Old Orchard mall along with Rush hospital and lots of fine restaurants within 15 minutes.
Only 20 minutes to the beach or expressway.
